fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Business and Industry, Environment, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives: Environment initiatives, Packaging Legislation, Plastic reduction, Biodegradable and Compostable, Oxodegradable
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
As part of its programme of innovation and continuous product development, IBI PLAST became the first company to manufacture compostable film and bags from Mater-Bi® cornstarch biopolymer.   
Flexibility in types, sizes and specification allows the company to supply Customers from across the public and private sectors in both Italy and throughout Europe, directly and through distributors and agents in Great Britain, France, Spain, Switzerland, Austria, Belgium, Slovenia and Poland.  
Our core business is the production and distribution of polyethylene and compostable bags and carrier bags and also specially-designed bins for separate organic waste collection.  
Our unique products are the exclusive aerated Bio.Box® and Ibi.Box® system, used widely as part of biowaste collection initiatives.   
We satisfy the broad and diverse needs of our Customers by converting several thousand tons of polyethylene and Mater-Bi® biopolymer, in a wide variety of products. Professionalism, product quality and Customer service are our primary goals, improved, day by day, through growing experiences.
